sources.title: THE CAPE TOWN AFFAIR
sources.description: South African secret agents attempt to save confidential microfilm before it falls into the hands of Communists.

sources.title: The Cape Town Affair (1967)
sources.description: South African secret agents attempt to save confidential microfilm before it falls into the hands of Communists. A color remake of the Sam Fuller film, Pickup on South Street. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-cape-town-affair-1967/

sources.title: The Cape Town Affair (1967) JACQUELINE BISSET
sources.description:
Exclusive FRIDAY at PizzaFLIX Edition!
Stars: Jacqueline Bisset, James Brolin, & Claire Trevor
Screenplay: Samuel Fuller, Harold Medford
Directed by: Robert D. Webb
In their first leading roles, STUNNING Jacqueline Bisset and a SMOOTH James Brolin shine in this cold-war spy thriller. The filmmakers didn’t pickpocket the plot from Samuel Fuller. It’s a remake of his late-period noir PICKUP ON SOUTH STREET. Locations moved from the gritty streets of New York City to the segregated ones of Cape Town and serve as a grim reminder of South Africa’s Apartheid.

metadata.Plot: South African secret agents attempt to save confidential microfilm before it falls into the hands of Communists.
metadata.Writer: Harold Medford, Samuel Fuller, Dwight Taylor
metadata.Actors: James Brolin, Jacqueline Bisset, Claire Trevor
